clusterList.phrase: they got combined through a customized nuke macro that we affectionately called pimp my mummy it was put together by one of our look development compositors chia-chi hu it combined all the layers and allowed us access to color sliders and color controls we had one input node that all had the layers in it-that got fed into pimp my mummy which split all those layers and assigned controls to each of them so we could dial the subsurface scattering separately without having to dig through the layers we spent a lot of time in compositing addressing a lot of the lighting issues by adjusting the different passes-all within the interface that chia-chi put together for this show
